feat: Complete Pickleball expense split MVP

Built full-stack real-time expense tracking app with Firebase.

Features:
- Session creation with shareable links
- Real-time player management
- Multi-device sync
- Expense logging (multiple itemized expenses)
- Automatic debt calculation (equal split algorithm)
- Mark debts as paid
- Session archiving
- Archive history viewing

Tech Stack:
- React 18 + TypeScript
- Vite 5 (build tool)
- Firebase Realtime Database
- Tailwind CSS (Swiss minimalist design)
- React Router (hash-based routing)
